pull.title: Fix for error in 'getbalance' when using watchonly addresses/scripts.
pull.body: This bug can result in too much watchonly balance being returned by the getbalance RPC call.

rename.from: Fix for error in 'getbalance' when using watchonly addresses.
rename.to: Fix for error in 'getbalance' when using watchonly addresses/scripts.

events.message: Fixed error in 'getbalance' when using watchonly addresses.

events.body:
Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/p4525_d512534cd71ebdb67bf0cb2a377dc7c2b06ba438/ for binaries and test log.
This test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/current/
Contact BlueMatt on freenode if something looks broken.

comments.body: Do we need this extra warning in addition to the **This is a pre-release test build - use at your own risk - do not use for mining or merchant applications** that already comes in pre-release builds by default?

Depends on how much this feature is going to be tested before 0.10.0 I suppose.
Shall I remove it?
Yeah, I think it's unnecessary. There are many things in ~~0.10~~ master that would require warnings otherwise :)
